title: Suplex

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Throw one player at another player, causing any abilities targeted toward either of them to actually target both of them. You may select yourself as one of the two targets. Both targets must be different players.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
***You were picked up and thrown.*** (Received by the Suplex's first target at the end of the night.)
***Someone was thrown at you.*** (Received by the Suplex's second target at the end of the night.)

desc:
Post 477
*Actin' like you won't get COMMAND GRABBED!*
